entry.def: If you describe someone as puckish, you mean that they play tricks on people or tease them.

example.ex: He had a puckish sense of humour.
example.tran: 他有种恶作剧式的幽默感。

auth_sentence.content: Fallon took a puckish approach in his monologue.

auth_sentence.content: His writing style in court opinions is literary, even puckish.

auth_sentence.content: Monk, whose Crepuscule With Nellie is reprised to highlight its puckish, teasing sensuality, had that in spades.
